post:
CSpace Hostings Debuts with a Great Offer in Estonia! (1GB VPS for €19.99/Year!)

CSPACE Hostings, estonia February 9, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

I love fun logos.  Welcome, CSpace Hostings!

At first glance, I like their web site.  They’ve got an 800 number for support, Looking Glass, a 30-day money back guarantee, and some offers in less usual places like Estonia.

Felicity from CSpace contacted us to extend a nice offer:

  • 1GB VPS for €19.99/year!
  • 2GB for €29.99/year!
  • 4GB for €39.99/year!

Nice prices and cool to see an offer in Tallinn, Estonia.

Let’s let Felicity tell us a little about CSpace Hostings:

“CSpace Hostings is a Web Hosting and an Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) in business online since 2012. Over the years we have evolved and have offered varied solutions such bandwidth servers and storage servers for various customer segments.

In mid of 2019 we launched our Tallinn, Estonia [EE] location. We operate our own AS208367 Network and Hardware. Our Network is based on Juniper MX for Core Routing with a mix of Juniper and Arista Switches in Tallinn, Estonia. We are based in Estonia and now offer Dedicated Servers, Colocation and IP Transit in Tallinn, Estonia. We are the only provider not-singled homed and offer ample of resources vs price ratio. We are friendly and happy to help anyone with any customization and budget constraints you may have.”

If you’re interested, they also offer cPanel, Reseller, and WordPress hosting.

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Estonia.  You can find their TOS on their website and you can pay with Credit/Debit Card (through Stripe), Paypal, bank transfer, and SOFORT.

They look like a provider who’s got their act together – and that logo rocks 👽.  If you decide to become a CSpace Hostings customer, please comment below!

Now read more to see the offers!

  • 1GB RAM
  • 20GB SSD
  • 1x vCPU
  • 2TB Transfer
  • 1x IPv4 & 1x IPv6
  • KVM/SolusVM

NETWORK INFO

Our network provides customers with a blend of carriers such as Cogent, Elisa and CITIC-NTT and PITER-IX. We will be connected to Telia and RTIX in the upcoming months.

  • IPv4: 45.142.100.34
  • IPv6: 2a10:46c0:0:3::2
  • Looking Glass: https://lg.cspacehostings.com/
  • Mirror Server(Test Files): https://mirror.cspacehostings.com


HOST NODE SPECIFICATIONS
These VPS will be hosted at Infonet DC (Tallinn, Estonia).

  • 2x Intel Xeon E5-2680 CPU
  • 128GB RAM (Load Reduction)
  • 4x480GB HP Mixed-use SSD (RAID10)
  • 4x1Gbps Uplink
Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!

I'm Andrew, techno polymath and long-time LowEndTalk community Moderator. My technical interests include all things Unix, perl, python, shell scripting, and relational database systems. I enjoy writing technical articles here on LowEndBox to help people get more out of their VPSes.
